title: New: Wise Blood – Rat
content:
After a forced two or three day absence (server issues, apologies), CitR is back, and what better to announce our return with than a new track from Pittsburgh genius Wise Blood.

Having seemingly been kicking about for an age, Christopher Laufman is finally prepping the release of his debut LP, id, out 25 June via Dovecote. Rat, the first track taken from id, premiered via The Fader alongside a short interview, is a colourful, frantic slice of tropical pop. With the near rap delivery, not too disimilar to WHY?, and Idiot Glee style instrumental sections, it’s more than enough to get me very excited for id.
